comments:
Description:
Exception will throw when click Manage Drivers button in Data Source dialog
(eclipse 3.1)
Steps to reproduce
1. New a JDBC data source
2. Click Manage Drivers button

Expected result:
No error.

Actual result:
java.lang.ClassCastException

ialogArea(JdbcDriverManagerDialog.java:127)
